@usedefault
{{html:
 <h1 data-bind="text: selectedBucket().name"></h1>
   <ul>
    <li data-bind="text: selectedBucket().status">
    </li>
    <li data-bind="text: selectedBucket().plan">
    </li>
    <li data-bind="text: selectedBucket().region">
    </li>
    <li data-bind="text: selectedBucket().imageName">
    </li>
   </ul>
  <div>
    <h1>Power</h1>
    <input data-bind="click: selectedBucket().powerOffBucket, visible: selectedBucket().status() == 'active'" type="submit" value="Power Off"/>
    <input data-bind="click: selectedBucket().bootBucket, visible: selectedBucket().status() != 'active'" type="submit" value="Boot"/>
  </div>
  <div>
    <h1>Access</h1>
    <h2>Console Access</h2>
    Coming soon...
    <h2>Reset Root Password</h2>
    Coming soon...
  </div>
  <div>
    <h1>Plan</h1>
    {{include:plan_list}}
    <input type="submit" value="Resize" data-bind="click: selectedBucket().resize" />
  </div>
  <div>
    <h1>Snapshots</h1>
    <h2>Take a Snapshot</h2>
    <div data-bind="visible: selectedBucket().status() == 'off'">
      Snapshot name: <input data-bind='value: newSnapshot().name, valueUpdate: "afterkeydown"' type="text"/>
      <input type="submit" value="Create snapshot" data-bind="click: saveSnapshot" />
    </div>
    <div data-bind="visible: selectedBucket().status() == 'active'">
      You must turn it off before creating snapshot
    </div>
    <h2>Restore from Snapshot</h2>
    <ul data-bind="foreach: snapshots">
      <li><input type="radio" name="snapshot" /><span data-bind="text: name"></span></li>
    </ul>
    <input type="submit" value="Restore" data-bind="click: restoreSnapshot" />
  </div>
  <div>
    <h1>Backups</h1>
    <h2>Automatic backups</h2>
    Coming soon...

    <h2>Restore from backup</h2>
    Coming soon...
  </div>
  <div>
    <h1>Settings</h1>
    <h2>Kernel</h2>
    {{include:image_list}}



    <h2>Rename</h2>
    New name: <input data-bind='value: selectedBucket().name, valueUpdate: "afterkeydown"' type="text"/>
    <input type="submit" value="Change name" data-bind="click: saveAllBuckets" />

  </div>
  <div>
    <h1>Graphs</h1>
    <h2>Real Time</h2>
    <h2>7 Days</h2>
    <h2>30 Days</h2>
    <h2>365 Days</h2>
    Coming soon...
  </div>
  <div>
    <h1>Destroy</h1>
    <input data-bind="click: selectedBucket().destroy" data-confirm="Are you sure you want to destroy this droplet?" name="commit" type="submit" value="Destroy"></input>
  </div>
  <div>
    <h1>History</h1>
    <table data-bind="visible: selectedBucket().history().length > 0">
  <thead>
   <tr>
    <th>
     Event
    </th>
    <th>
     Initiated
    </th>
    <th>
     Execution Time
    </th>
   </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody data-bind="foreach: selectedBucket().history">
   <tr>
    <td data-bind="text: event">
    </td>
    <td data-bind="text: initiated">
    </td>
    <td data-bind="text: execution">
    </td>
   </tr>
  </tbody>
 </table>
  </div>

}}
